column5: The Griffin Villa is one of 4 luxury villas at D6 Retreat. This villa sleeps 6 (2 full beds & a full pull-out sofa), has a full kitchen, washer/dryer, access to infinity pool, outdoor games, bird watching, hammocks & hiking on 23 acres. Each villa has luxury linens, memory foam mattresses, pack n play, booster chair, pet bowls, DirectTV, wifi, AC/heat, dishes, and pots/pans.
column8: Griffin Villa @ D6: Heated Pool, Games, Hike 23 ac
